item.title: Xp case
item.dc:creator: @roberini roberini
item.description:
@roberini wrote:

addSkillXP(****, ####);

**** is the skill xp

is which skill(Starting at the upper left corner, ending at the bottom right corner, going up and down), so for example under here, would add 100 exp for attack.

addSkillXP(100, 0);

         case OBJ ID:
            if (objectX == XXXX && objectY == YYYY) //X , Y ARE THE COORDS OF OBJECT???

                sendMessage(

help, please and ty!
